name: Mega Man Battle Network 3D
description:
Mega Man Battle Network 3D's first real public build!

What you can expect:

- Several battles!

- A fight with the first boss, Fire Man EXE!

- Folder editing!

Controls:

Keyboard - 

Z = Accept

X = Cancel

Arrow Keys = Movement

A or S = Custom Button (Chip Selection)

More to come, soon!
